question.text:
De zinnen van alinea 5 staan hierboven, maar niet in de juiste volgorde.
→ Schrijf de letters van de zinnen in de juiste volgorde op.

content_context.text:
[a] "There's plenty of people like Jorja Smith and Mahalia who are really, really flying the flag for UK R'n'B, and I think that's going to change hopefully in the future." With Vickery too, that change is surely closer. That tattoo behind his ear is just a small reminder of how much he can achieve.
[b] "The thing is the UK R'n'B scene is so, so good," he says. "But when you turn on a radio you will never find an R'n'B song on in the daytime," he explains.
[c] Vickery says he hopes he adds another voice to highlight the UK's new resurging R'n'B scene, which he feels is overlooked.
